001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.detect;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ProtocolDetector;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ProtocolModule;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.Collection;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Objects;
011import java.util.Set;
012
013/**
014 * Default detector leveraging enabled protocol modules, first matching by configured ports then
015 * falling back to signature heuristics.
016 * <p>Thread-safe for concurrent classification requests once constructed.</p>
017 */
018public final class DefaultProtocolDetector implements ProtocolDetector {
019  private final List<ProtocolModule> modules;
020  private final Set<ProtocolId> enabled;
021
022  /**
023   * Creates a detector using the supplied protocol modules and enabled set.
024   *
025   * @param modules protocol modules to consult
026   * @param enabled subset of protocols that should be considered
027   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code modules} or {@code enabled} is {@code null}
028   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
029   */  public DefaultProtocolDetector(Collection<ProtocolModule> modules, Set<ProtocolId> enabled) {
030    this.modules = List.copyOf(Objects.requireNonNull(modules, "modules"));
031    this.enabled = Set.copyOf(Objects.requireNonNull(enabled, "enabled"));
032  }
033
034  /**
035   * Classifies a flow using port hints followed by signature heuristics.
036   *
037   * @param flow five-tuple describing the connection
038   * @param serverPortHint optional server port hint (0 or negative ignored)
039   * @param prefacePeek leading bytes from the stream for signature detection; may be {@code null}
040   * @return detected protocol id, or {@link ProtocolId#UNKNOWN} when ambiguous or unsupported
041   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code flow} is {@code null}
042   * @implNote Prefers port-based detection before inspecting signatures to avoid expensive heuristics.
043   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
044   */  @Override
045  public ProtocolId classify(FiveTuple flow, int serverPortHint, byte[] prefacePeek) {
046    Objects.requireNonNull(flow, "flow");
047    List<ProtocolModule> candidates = new ArrayList<>();
048
049    int candidatePort = serverPortHint > 0 ? serverPortHint : flow.dstPort();
050
051    for (ProtocolModule module : modules) {
052      if (!enabled.contains(module.id())) continue;
053      if (module.defaultServerPorts().contains(candidatePort)) {
054        candidates.add(module);
055      }
056    }
057
058    if (candidates.size() == 1) {
059      return candidates.get(0).id();
060    }
061
062    // Either zero or multiple candidates by port; apply signature heuristics.
063    ProtocolModule matched = null;
064    for (ProtocolModule module : modules) {
065      if (!enabled.contains(module.id())) continue;
066      if (module.matchesSignature(prefacePeek)) {
067        if (matched != null) {
068          // Multiple matches -> ambiguous, fall back to UNKNOWN.
069          return ProtocolId.UNKNOWN;
070        }
071        matched = module;
072      }
073    }
074
075    return matched != null ? matched.id() : ProtocolId.UNKNOWN;
076  }
077}
078
079
080
